title: Camping Under the Stars
story: We're sleeping here tonight, Jason. In the tent? Yes. It will be fun. I've never slept in a tent before. That's why I brought sleeping bags. Sleeping bags? What's that? Just slide into it, son. Hey! I like this. It's warm.
summary: Join Jason and his father on their first camping trip as they experience the joy of sleeping under the stars and discover the comfort of sleeping bags.
image: An image of a tent pitched under a starry night sky with two sleeping bags inside.
